title: T213-2 Ty Cobb Bat Off  PSA 1.5 Spectacular!!
author: wondo

posts.post_title: T213-2 Ty Cobb Bat Off  PSA 1.5 Spectacular!!
posts.post_content:
For sale: A beautiful Ty Cobb Bat Off T213-2 Coupon.  The technical grade is a bit harsh.  There is a crease / wrinkle the length of the bat in the typical position on this issue.  Outstanding clarity and color to go along with nice centering make this a high-end example.  Price is $7500 dlvd obo.  Please PM with any questions or to discuss.  Thank you.

John Wondowski
wow just browsing through looking for nice T213s and saw this.  Can't believe this didnt get snagged up.  Rare and under appreciated card especially with that eye appeal.
